title: Magnetic field near two current carrying wires

content.question: Two long, parallel, straight wires in the plane of the page each carry a current I to the right, as shown above. Points P1 and P2 are in the plane of the page, with P1 being midway between the wires. Which of the following is true of the net magnetic field at the two points that result from the two currents?

choices.label: Point P1 Point P2 Directed out of page Directed into pag
Point P1 Point P2 Directed out of page Directed out of page
Point P1 Point P2 Has magnitude zero Directed into page
Point P1 Point P2 Has magnitude zero Directed out of page
Point P1 Point P2 Directed into page Directed into page

content.answer: Point P1 Point P2 Has magnitude zero Directed out of page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
